#summary Trip Application

= Introduction =
== Trip Application ==
* This project is an example with low level datastore API


= Details =

* Trip Application
 * Entity objects: Trip, HolidayTrip, RegularTrip
 * Control objects: AddTripServlet
 * Boundary objects: getAllTrips.jsp, createTrip.jsp, PersistenceTrip
 * Utility objects: TripFactory
